Correction to my precious post. The daito is at:
http://www.artswords.com/k=
anesada.htm

~Okita
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jon Mesina 
  T=
o: SHQ@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, December 10, 2004 2:00 PM
  Subject=
: Re: [SHQ] Swords


  The name at the top post is "Izuminokami Kanesada" w=
hich was the maker of Hijikata's blade. From what my translator picked up, =
the poster was able to visit someone who owned a Kanesada blade made by the=
 11th Kanesada. 

  As for the overseas auctions/sales, there are currently=
 two Kanesada blades for sale here in the U.S.

  Aizu Kanesada wakizashi:
=
  http://www.artswords.com/aizukanesada.htm

  Izuminokami Kanesada daito:
=
  http://www.artswords.com/aizukanesada.htm

  The daito has appraisal pape=
rs, but they are not translated like the ones on the wakizashi. 


  ~Okita=
